channel.title: Port forwarding issues
channel.description:
:( :( :( :( okai the problem is me and a friend are making a 508 server now we have a source and a client ready to go but when we try to connect off of my computer it sais error connecting to server now im at his house for the weekend and almost every weekend we sahre connection through a belkin router wireless we had it working at one point but idk what happened when i came over can somebody help we know it's something to do with portforwarding because nothing else would mess us up like this all who try are greatly appreciated
~~hostile~~

now im at his house for the weekend and almost every weekend we sahre connection through a belkin router wireless
